1.Title: Oversized Barrel
1.Description: Increases ATK by <color=#2BAD00>7.5%</color>. Landing a critical hit on an enemy will inflict an additional 200% of ATK as DMG. This effect can trigger once every <color=#2BAD00>8</color>s.

2.Title: Oversized Barrel
2.Description: Increases ATK by <color=#2BAD00>8.6%</color>. Landing a critical hit on an enemy will inflict an additional 200% of ATK as DMG. This effect can trigger once every <color=#2BAD00>7.5</color>s.

3.Title: Oversized Barrel
3.Description: Increases ATK by <color=#2BAD00>9.7%</color>. Landing a critical hit on an enemy will inflict an additional 200% of ATK as DMG. This effect can trigger once every <color=#2BAD00>7</color>s.

4.Title: Oversized Barrel
4.Description: Increases ATK by <color=#2BAD00>10.8%</color>. Landing a critical hit on an enemy will inflict an additional 200% of ATK as DMG. This effect can trigger once every <color=#2BAD00>6.5</color>s.

5.Title: Oversized Barrel
5.Description: Increases ATK by <color=#2BAD00>12%</color>. Landing a critical hit on an enemy will inflict an additional 200% of ATK as DMG. This effect can trigger once every <color=#2BAD00>6</color>s.
